documentation.title: KoolTabsItem Class [PHP]
documentation.metadescription: KoolTabs - Powerful PHP Tab Menu - Fast rendering, Flexible CSS Style and Search Engine Friendly make KoolTabs the great PHP Tab Menu solution for your website navigation system.
documentation.metakeywords: php tab, php tab menu, php tabstrip, ajax tab menu

property.name: id
property.shortdesc: Get or set the id for KoolTabsItem
property.longdesc: Get or set the id for KoolTabsItem

property.shortdesc: Get or set the text for KoolTabsItem
property.longdesc: Get or set the text for KoolTabsItem

property.name: link
property.shortdesc: Get or set the link for KoolTabsItem
property.longdesc: Get or set the link for KoolTabsItem

property.name: enabled
property.shortdesc: Get or set whether the tab is enabled/disabled
property.longdesc: Get or set whether the tab is enabled/disabled

property.name: selected
property.shortdesc: Get or set whether the tab is selected.
property.longdesc: Get or set whether the tab is selected.

property.name: width

property.longdesc: Get or set the width for KoolTabsItem

property.name: height
property.shortdesc: Get or set the height for KoolTabsItem
property.longdesc: Get or set the height for KoolTabsItem
